name: The RAK International Psychiatry Congress
content: The RAK International Psychiatry Congress is the leading platform dedicated to Psychiatrists, Psychologists, Psychotherapists, and Mental Health experts, to discuss the future of the psychiatry in the region and to exchange ideas about the best practices in the field. The RAK International Psychiatry Congress will bring together a team of outstanding regional and international expert faculty members for two days of cutting edge medical education sessions focused on latest advances and best practices in the field of mental health across a broad scale of mental disorders. The program will include a wide range of topics with keynotes, interactive panel discussions, workshops and posters presentations that will give you the opportunity to learn from the expertsâ€™ recent research achievement, powerful experiences and share the latest advances in the diagnosis and management of all mental disorders for improving the quality of life for patients with mental health issues. Price : USD 199-1000
